ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: So, the level 19 now does 500/10*2= 100 points of damage? Scourge goes 1600/10*2=320? And the 49 does 6000/10*2=1200? This seems like too big a hit, these
ygData.messageBody:
So, the level 19 now does 500/10*2= 100 points of damage? Scourge goes
1600/10*2=320? And the 49 does 6000/10*2=1200? This seems like too big a
hit, these actually correct? Please, let me be wrong on this one... 100
points of damage at level 19 in insane... SS does 78 at 18th level as it
is... I must be wrong on this one...

But DAMN! I had heard scourge did 1600, but I didn't know about the 6000
damage one...sheesh

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 11:19 AM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting


From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>

The thing the Shamans are miffed about is that our disease line of
spells used to do OBSCENE damage. The level 19 spell did 500 damage,
level 34 did 1600, and our level 49 did over 6000. Only thing was it
took 11+ minutes for the spell to wear off, so they were only good for
kiting. Our disease line had the duration cut by a factor of 10 and had
the damage doubled.

On the plus side though, our poison spells got a big power up.
Envenomed breath now does 25 points per tic for 21 tics. You can still
kite yellows fairly easily with just this spell, but the days of kiting
deep reds with ease are over for shamans.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Whitcraft,David [SMTP:DWHITCRAFT@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 11:12 AM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting
>
> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Question about kiting. Alot of the DoT spells just got their damage
> per tick
> doubles and time halved (or something similar to this - time lessened
> damage
> upped). Alot of people seem to be pissed bout this in the Shaman
> community.
> I've got a shaman that will hit 19 tonight, and was wondering why
> people in
> the kiting community are mad about this? Only thing I can think of is
> the
> longer it takes to do the damage, the more mana you regain running
> around.
>
> -Leod, Fennin Ro, SOK
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joel Thronburg [mailto:jthronburg@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 10:06 AM
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting
>
>
> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
> Kiting. Hit the mob with a spell, usually a damage over time. Run
> run
> run run until the spell wears off. Stop, recast, run some more.
> Repeat
> until OOM or beast is dead. Med up and do it again.
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Omeg Felligan [SMTP:omeg_felligan@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 10:06 AM
> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting
> >
> > From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
> >
> > Yet again, stupid question...what exactly is kiting? I get the
> basic
> > "whack
> > it and run" but then what? and why run?
> >
> > Thanks,
> > Omeg
> >
> >
> > >Once word: Kiting...
> >
